description:
Our take on this party game. Currently there are over 3000 words and growing. If you have lists you would like add send them to us!
----------------
The games is to be played with a group of friends, family or enemies. The group must divide into two teams and 
sit in a circle alternating teams in the circle. When the round starts beeps will begin as time gets
closer to being done in the round the beeps will get closer together. The person with the device gets their
team mates to guess the word or phrase without spelling it or using rhymes. When the word is guessed the next team
button in pushed and the device is passed to the next person. If you are holding the device when the buzzer 
goes off the other team gets a point.
